84a11cad23688900fcf10649a96d17bk.Summary: Vidhu from Exotel called Mr. Deepak to reactivate a campaign. She requested him to raise a support ticket and assured to follow up for a quick resolution. Vidhu mentioned that Deepak's account manager will be unavailable for the next 10 days, but she will handle his queries in the meantime. Deepak thanked her.
